```{r setup}
library(Lab5)
library(sf)
library(ggplot2)
library(httr)
library(rjson)
```

Most of this information is available scattered throughout the R documentation. This appendix brings it all together in one place. 

This package collects data from https://www.thenmap.net/ and lets the user choose 
which spatial data to plot through different parameters such as "version", "dataset", "modules", "date" and "language".
